TopicTitle: Gold Stingray Inc. Spacecraft Division [New: Cygnus, Azure Kite, Azure Orca]

Articles.Content: Thanks for the support I have made fash ships and the trick I use is put rocket egine and fuel I dont no why people don\'t use it more often

@deadly654321: the Flight Airspeed Record is 2,193.2 mp/h, which translates to Mach 1.2-5.0, so correcting myself, we must break the record of 2,19.2mp/h, not Mach 9.

Plaatinum Aerospace Technologies
Ohh well let\'s try mech 9 anyway *calls jeb* 'we need you *jef muffled response*' well I don\'t care if you found a new planet we need you'
We should also make more Jeb clones, so we can let the crazy Kerbonauts pilot the ship that we (hopefully) can make! You know Jeb......

I have an idea all workers including me Will try to make a ship faster then the fastest earth ship witch I believe go pass sound berries 9 times if anyone is successful post it also if you know a faster plane tell us and that will be our new goal

Will try to make a ship faster then the fastest earth ship witch I believe go pass sound berries 9 times
sound berries

Wat.
Sorry that was autocorrect my archenemy I ment speed berrier

Hi, i want to present some of my Aircrafts.

https://www.dropbox.com/sh/tuhv8r471ewnc76/bncYaamsKS#/

@Phoenix Aerospace I think i have something for you

the first 2 Pictures.. i don\'t think this plane cares about 25000 litres more fuel ???

You need the Heavy Struts (sorry, dont know which pack) and the nova punch pack.

all the other planes are stock (except for some details like nosecones etc. if there is interest, i will upload the craft-files to dropbox, and send you the link via PM)

@Luigibro606

also i would like to apply to your company!
Sure! What job do you want?

Something build/ test related ;D

How do you like my planes?

Some of them are pretty big; if they can handle cargo, they look like good heavy bombers.

Welp, I guess your an Engineer then. :3
Sounds great! i\'ll try to strap on some cargo to the big one, and i\'ll upload some pictures in 5 mins or so!

What is my job?

(Please read application im PM)

Not trying to beg.

Plaatinum Aerospace Technologies

Ah, just saw, that, Receptionist sounds good. Would make the whole company more streamlined.

Promotion tiem
Thanks!

ANNOUNCEMENT TO PATRONS: With my new position as receptionist, the way of ordering spacecraft will go like this: PM me or post below me in the format below.

Format:

Type of Spacecraft: Rocket or Spaceplane

Engineer who you want to build it: (Optional)

Description:

As stated on the front page, please do not ask continually: Is it done yet? etc.

Thanks!

Gold Stingray Receptionist

Plaatinum Aerospace Technologies

Bombs are coming

Cargos used: 500 kg Fuel Tanks attached with Standard Decouplers; 1x4 Meter Tank (1120 kg Fuel), long decoupler; Modular Missiles (6x)

The last picture is the big plane carrying 8 x 1120 kg of bombs (!)(== 16 standard Fuel Tanks). still not maxing it out ???

pics: https://www.dropbox.com/sh/9fq979h9k3l4fa5/GyV9yxT0UH

Type of spacecraft: Rocket:

Description: I want a stock rocket that is easy to fly and doesn\'t wobble too much if I add a mechjeb. It needs to be chunky enough to lift a minimus/mun lander with extra parts (zoxygon stuff, solar panels, and a small rover)

If you choose to accept, you\'re gonna need mechjeb, zoxygon, and the cart mod.

Thanks honey friend fellow ksp player!
